text: 1:10 1 Jon 1:8E suam, “E arazir kurabagh amir puvatɨ,” kamaghɨn e Godɨn mɨkɨm suam, “A ifarir God.” Ezɨ kamaghɨn e an akaba barazir puvatɨ.1:10 Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn aven itir akɨnafarir otevir avɨribar akar kam ikia ghaze, “Gumazamiziba bar moghɨra arazir kuram gami.” Nɨ Onger Akaba 14:3, ko Aisaia 53:6, ko Aisaia 64:6ɨn gan.
